about_the_game:
This DLC unlocks the following contents for Samawa Idle:

1- Damage Meter: Track the damage of each tower and the champion to gain insights into performance and decide what to improve next.

2- Four New Backgrounds: Enhance your visual experience with four new backgrounds, adding variety and a fresh look to your gameplay environment.

3- More statistics: Gain access to a range of detailed statistics, including gold per minute, ether per hour, time played, total bullets fired, and many more metrics.
